name: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
name_original: The Winning Secret of the Newbie Strategist Princess
description:
A neighboring country has declared war!
The first war in a long time. Due to a shortage of personnel, Estelle, the princess, has taken command of the army.
She can't afford to lose this war, but... What will she do, Estelle!?


Turn-based strategy SLG. You move soldiers as units and battle with the enemy army.
Status bonuses are granted to soldiers who achieve military success.
If you want more military funds, you can work part-time in the towns in your territory.


  • Turn-based strategy SLG
  • Main character fully voiced
  • Auto-play function
